text: Slaveyka Ruzhinska Nikolova (Славейка Ружинска Николова , born in Kubrat) was a Bulgarian female weightlifter, competing in the 69 kg category and representing Bulgaria at international competitions. She participated at the 2004 Summer Olympics in the 69 kg event. She competed at world championships, most recently at the 2007 World Weightlifting Championships. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:40px;"|Year ! rowspan="2" style="width:250px;"|Venue ! rowspan="2" style="width:60px;"|Weight !colspan=4| Snatch (kg) !colspan=4| Clean & Jerk (kg) ! rowspan="2" style="width:40px;"| Total ! rowspan="2" style="width:40px;"| Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|Summer Olympics |- |2004 || align=left| Athens, Greece|| 69 kg |||| || || || || || || || ||4 |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2007 || align=left| Chiang Mai, Thailand|| 69 kg ||90||95||96||16||112|| ~~117~~ || ~~117~~ ||18||208||17 |- |2003 || align=left| Vancouver, Canada || 75 kg || ~~105~~ ||105||112.5||4||135||140|| ~~145~~ ||||252.5|| |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian female weightlifters Category:Weightlifters at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic weightlifters of Bulgaria Category:People from Kubrat (town) Category:World Weightlifting Championships medalists
